title: Advanced Curricular and Instructional Adaptations for Students with Special Needs
description: Advanced studies and skills in adaptation and modification of curriculum and instructional techniques to meet the needs of students with special needs. Educational implications of current learning theories as applied to individuals with special needs. Development and application of a remedial therapy with appropriate individual(s). Development of instruction based on the adopted instructional program for English Language Development. 3 seminars, 1 activity.
prerequisites: Acceptance into Level II Special Education Credential Program and EDUC 441
